Text: not good, don't waste your time with this one.

Seriously, this is a waste of time. It uses stock footage from before Futurama was released and barely goes into any detail. If your a hardcore fan you would have seen this already and if your not you won't be interested. 
I actually bothered to come back online and post this b/cuz it was that boring. And I think Futurama is currently the best show on tv
